title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added Dependabot support for Helm private registries in documentation.
Updated Copilot setup guides to use shared next steps content and clarified preview terms.
Simplified Actions workflow trigger documentation by moving details to a reusable.
Added new content linter rules (GHD046, GHD051) for release phase terminology and frontmatter whitespace.
Documented API permission changes in GHES 3.14 release notes.

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added Dependabot support for Helm private registries in documentation.
- Updated Copilot setup guides to use shared next steps content and clarified preview terms.
- Simplified Actions workflow trigger documentation by moving details to a reusable.
- Added new content linter rules (GHD046, GHD051) for release phase terminology and frontmatter whitespace.
- Documented API permission changes in GHES 3.14 release notes.
- Enhanced filename reconciliation to consider `shortTitle`.
